name: Not So Super Mario
description:
Embark on a journey through the Mushroom Kingdom to stop the all powerful Bowser to collect the new RED STARS.

This game was created in Scratch, a children's programming website. If you wan't to check out the original version made by me, here's the link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/739130615/

The game was converted into a Electron Windows Executable file using TurboWarp Packager. https://packager.turbowarp.org/

I have nothing against the Nintendo Co. All their assets, characters and music was used in this game.
